responses: Hi there, how can I help?

My name is Charles Vanchieri, I enjoy spending time with my wife Tarryn and our 5yr old twins, Aston & Isla.  I have played soccer my entire life so when I can I love to get out on the field and run around, the family loves the sun and beach so when the weather is right that is where you can find us.  On the professional side, I am hardworking, reliable, and eager to find a company where I can build valuable lasting relationships, and where I can use my data science and project management skills to assist in the company's growth while also learning from those around me.

patterns: what programming language do you know
responses: I am skilled in the Python programming language and have experience with React-Natve, HTML, and CSS as well.  I enjoy working with machine learning, computer vision, modeling, and all the other fancy aspects in data science, but what I have really been enjoying is sourcing, manipulating, analyzing, storing data. I have always believed that to be increasingly productive we need to have the highest efficiency, and data sourcing, analyzing, storing are all aspects where efficiency needs to be at its peak and I enjoy that challenge.

patterns: tell me why I should hire you
responses: I believe I would be a value asset to any team and company that I am a part of, I have always been recognized as a leader, a great communicator, and someone that other want to work with as I am productive, reliable, and supportive to those around me.  I truly enjoy working with data in all aspects and am still eager to keep learning to grow my knowledge for my personal growth as well as the company's growth.  For the last 6 years I have been working on my own and now am looking forward to finding a working situation where I can build positive, productive, lasting relationships for the next 5+ years if the relationships are mutually beneficial
My GitHub profile can be found here: 'https://github.com/dashboard', My Portfolio of all my projects & notes can be found here: 'https://cvanchieri.github.io/DSPortfolio/'.

My latest project is a Crypto Token Scraper, its a live site where a user can enter a token 'symbol' then the program scrapes a few websites for data, gathers data from a few APIs, and then displays it for the user. You can find it here: 'https://portfolioprojects.herokuapp.com/coinscraper'.
Feel free to reach out anytime, my contact info ---> email @ CVanchieri@gmail.com | phone @ 650-237-9474 | socials @ https://linktr.ee/Cvanchieri6

patterns: where do you see yourself in 5 years
responses: I want to become invaluable to any company that I work for in many aspects, the productivity, relationships, products, I want a company to say 'theres no way we could ever replace Charles he is to valuable to us it too many ways, everyone enjoys working with him'.  I have 2 children so in 5 years I would definitely want to be in a situation where I have been with the company for a few years and have worked or am working on advancing within the company and have been advancing my own knowledge too.  I don't really know what my 'dream job' would be yet as there is still so many aspects of data science to experience, but what I do know is my dream job scenario, it is one where I enjoy coming and performing my work everyday no matter how tired a may be, one where I have built intriguing, resourceful relationships, that keep me engaged, and last but not least, one where I can see the future opportunities for myself as well as the company.
